title: Benedict Evans on How Tech Will Change the World | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Benedict Evans on How Tech Will Change the World | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Speaking at BoF’s VOICES, the Silicon Valley venture capitalist sketched out a vision for how software and the internet would transform the world’s economy, giving rise to new business opportunities.To watch Benedict's talk at VOICES 2018 click here.
description:
Speaking at BoF’s VOICES, the Silicon Valley venture capitalist sketched out a vision for how software and the internet would transform the world’s economy, giving rise to new business opportunities.

To watch Benedict's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
